src:
Ana Bárbara presume a su hijo mayor en redes y la llaman suegra
La cantante Ana Bárbara presume a su hijo mayor en redes y la llaman suegra
04 Nov 2019, 15:30 by Jorge Rodarte
Ana Bárbara presume a su hijo mayor en redes y la llaman suegra. El joven, quien se llama Máximo Emiliano, celebra su cumpleaños 19 y su famosa mamá lo felicita en Instagram. Seguidoras de Ana Bárbara le hacen ver que está muy guapo y hasta la llaman suegra.
La cantante Ana Bárbara es una madre orgullosa de todos sus hijos, pero el que ocupa ahora su atención es Emiliano, el mayor, ya que acaba de cumplir 19 años de vida y por esa razón lo felicita.







Sólo soy una aprendiz de mamá y he tratado de que disfrutes el milagro de estar aquí cada instante. Hoy elevo al cielo muchas notas musicales, por ser tu cumpleaños número 19, mi amor”, escribe Ana Bárbara en Instagram.
A través de un collage de fotografías, Ana Bárbara evoca diferentes etapas en la vida del joven Emiliano, quien es muy bien parecido y ella le hace saber que elevará al cielo "muchas notas musicales" para celebrarlo.



Emiliano está inscrito en un colegio militar, desde su preparatoria, motivo por el cual se ve en pocas ocasiones al año con su mamá y hermanos.



Y varios usuarios en la red felicitan a Ana Bárbara por ser mamá de un niño ejemplar, y a él por tener una madre que da todo por sacar adelante a su familia, incluso, hay quienes la llaman ya "suegra".
Eres una excelente mamá", "Dios va a premiarte cuando veas realizar los sueños de tus hijos", "Cuando empecé a ser tu fan Emiliano estába chiquito", "Hueleees a suegra, que BOMBON tu chiquito", le expresan a la cantante.



Ana Bárbara ha sabido ser una buena madre soltera para sus tres hijos Emiliano Gallardo Ugalde, José María Fernández Ugalde y Jerónimo Barba Ugalde.



Y también tiene a su cargo a Paula y José Emilio Fernández Levy, ambos hijos de la fallecida Mariana Levy y José María Fernández “El Pirru”, a quienes la cantante ha criado como hijos propios, luego de la muerte de su mamá, ocurrida en abril de 2005.









Ana Bárbara
text:
Ana Bárbara boasts her eldest son in networks and they call her mother-in-law
The singer Ana Bárbara boasts her eldest son in networks and they call her mother-in-law
04 Nov 2019, 15:30 by Jorge Rodarte
Ana Bárbara boasts her eldest son in networks and they call her mother-in-law. The young man, who is called Máximo Emiliano, celebrates his 19th birthday and his famous mom congratulates him on Instagram. Ana Barbara's followers make her see that he is very handsome and even call her mother-in-law.
The singer Ana Bárbara is a proud mother of all her children, but the one who now occupies her attention is Emiliano, the eldest, since she has just turned 19 years old and for that reason congratulates him.







I'm just a mom's apprentice and I've tried to enjoy the miracle of being here every moment. Today I raise many musical notes to the sky, for being your 19th birthday, my love, ”writes Ana Barbara on Instagram.
Through a collage of photographs, Ana Bárbara evokes different stages in the life of the young Emiliano, who is very good looking and she lets him know that he will raise "many musical notes" to the sky to celebrate it.



Emiliano is enrolled in a military school, since his high school, which is why he rarely meets his mother and siblings a year.



And several users on the network congratulate Ana Bárbara for being the mother of an exemplary child, and him for having a mother who gives everything to move her family forward, even, there are those who already call her "mother-in-law".
You are an excellent mom "," God is going to reward you when you see your children's dreams come true "," When I started being your fan Emiliano was very young "," Hueleees a mother-in-law, BOMBON your little one ", they express to the singer.



Ana Bárbara has known how to be a good single mother for her three children Emiliano Gallardo Ugalde, José María Fernández Ugalde and Jerónimo Barba Ugalde.



And he is also in charge of Paula and José Emilio Fernández Levy, both children of the late Mariana Levy and José María Fernández “El Pirru”, whom the singer has raised as her own children, after the death of her mother, occurred in April 2005









Ana Barbara
